transcripts.text: To all my NRA friends, let's react to some Joe Biden clips.  This is going to be fun.

If there's ever a problem, just walk out on the balcony here or walk out, put that double barrel shotgun and fire two blasts outside the house.  I promise you, who's ever coming in is not going to, you don't need an AR-15.  It's harder to aim.  It's harder to use.  And in fact, you don't need 30 rounds to protect yourself.

Yeah, it's really going to work.  As someone who actually was in a home when someone broke in, I'm sorry, but I'm not going to be going outside when they're inside.  shooting a shotgun at to nothing.  Makes zero sense.

You know, that shows you that Joe Biden knows nothing about weapons.  Obviously, he's never held a gun in his life.  When you come in my property, you're going to think the United States military is firing on your butt.
If Joe shoots like he campaigns, he's definitely going to need more than 30 rounds.
But I tell you, if you have a problem figuring out whether you're for me or Trump and you ain't black.

Wait a minute.  What happened to me?  Am I losing my blackness?  I am black, Joe.  And I'm a Democrat.  And guess what else?  I am the NRA.  And guess what?  Joe, I'm not voting for you.  And I'm not voting for you because you are a bigot.  I'm not voting for you because you think I can't think for myself.  Donald Trump has done more for African-Americans, Joe Biden, in 47 months than you have in 47 years.  Peace out to you.  Stay in your basement.  Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait.  Take your AR-14s.
Okay, this is not okay.  Hold on, hold on.
There's no AR-14.  It's the AR-15.  Now, is this the guy you want to be president of these United States?

It's ironic that you wanted to go outside then.  Now you're nowhere to be found.  America would love to see you.  In fact, Joe, come on.  We have all the AR-14s.  America's ready for you.  Come outside of your basement, Joe.
You're going to take care of the gun problem with me.  You're going to be the one who leads this effort.
I'm counting on you.  You and what army, Joe?  You think the military is going to enforce that?  I don't think so.

Hell no, Joe.  Ben O'Rourke, the guy who said he wants to go door to door to confiscate our guns, this is not a police state.  We do not need him or anybody else threatening to take away our Second Amendment.  We have a right to protect ourselves.

I got news for you, Beta O'Rourke.  If you come to my door, we're not greeting you with tacos.  And just so you know, America, Joe Biden and Kamala Harris wanted to put this psychopath in charge of gun confiscation.
Says you cannot have 20, 30, 40, 50 clips in a weapon.

Oh, shoot.  You can't have 30, 40, 50 clips in a weapon.  Will you go to the NRA and get some training on a weapon so you know about weapons?  I'm thinking to help you, Joe, but I'm still not going to vote for you.
I would pay a lot of money to watch Joe try to insert 60 clips into a gun.
If I'm elected and I'm coming for you and gun manufacturers, I'm going to take you on and I'm going to beat you.  I'm the only one who's done it.

I am the NRA and I'm black and I'm Democrat.  And that's why I'm not voting for you, because you want to take away my rights and other African-American rights and other people's rights to bear arms in this country.  Hell no, Joe.
